schema.name: Projects

properties.Title: Title
properties.Subtitle: Rich text
properties.CoverImage: Files & media (or use CoverImageUrl via URL/Rich text)
properties.CoverImageUrl: URL or Rich text (optional, as fallback)
properties.Technologies: Multi-select (e.g., React, Next.js, MongoDB, Stripe, Tailwind CSS, Vue.js, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Flutter, Firebase, D3.js, Angular, Figma, Adobe XD)
properties.Role: Select: [前端工程师, 全栈工程师, 移动端工程师, UI/UX 设计]
properties.Responsibilities: Rich text (use line breaks to separate items)

notes: Date controls list sorting; Year is for display/filter.
CoverImage 优先 Files，其次使用 CoverImageUrl（URL/Rich text）。
Language 字段存在时，前端会按 Chinese/English 过滤。
Slug 未填写时后端会基于 Title 自动生成。

rows.Title: 电子商务平台
rows.Subtitle: 现代React电商网站
rows.Description: 一个功能齐全的电子商务平台，包括产品展示、购物车、结账流程和支付集成。使用React和Next.js构建，MongoDB提供数据存储，Stripe处理支付。
rows.Responsibilities:
搭建Next.js电商基础架构
集成Stripe完成支付流程
实现购物车与订单管理
部署与性能优化（缓存/CDN）

rows.Title: 旅行探索应用
rows.Subtitle: iOS和Android旅行助手
rows.Description: 一款帮助用户发现和规划旅行的跨平台移动应用。包括位置搜索、地图集成、行程规划和旅行提醒功能。使用React Native开发，Firebase提供后端服务。
rows.Responsibilities:
行程规划与提醒模块
谷歌地图/定位集成
Firebase鉴权与数据同步
多端打包与发布

rows.Title: 任务管理系统
rows.Subtitle: 企业级项目管理工具
rows.Description: 一个综合性的任务管理系统，帮助团队跟踪项目进度、分配任务和管理资源。包括拖放看板、进度报告和团队协作功能。
rows.Responsibilities:
拖拽式看板交互
实时协作与通知
权限与角色管理
报表与统计图表

rows.Title: Health Tracker App
rows.Subtitle: Personal Health Monitoring Tool
rows.Description: A health monitoring application that integrates with wearable devices to track exercise, sleep, and nutrition data. Provides personalized insights and recommendations.
rows.Responsibilities:
Device SDK integration (HealthKit/Google Fit)
Auth & Sync with Firebase
Trends visualization and insights
Crash reporting and monitoring

rows.Title: Finance Dashboard
rows.Subtitle: Personal Finance Analytics Tool
rows.Description: An interactive dashboard for visualizing and analyzing personal finance data. Integrates multiple bank accounts and investments, offering spending trends and forecasting.
rows.Responsibilities:
OAuth aggregation to banks/APIs
Time-series visualization with D3.js
Budgeting and alerts
SSR & caching for performance

rows.Title: Social Media UI Design
rows.Subtitle: Modern Social Platform UX Design
rows.Description: A comprehensive UI/UX design kit for a social media platform, including user flows, interaction patterns, and visual style guides.
rows.Responsibilities:
Design system & components
Interactive prototypes
Usability testing
Accessibility guidelines
